title: Dataset   schema
description: A LINCS-published collection of data from an assay protocol generated by one or more DSGCs

items.title: Center_name
items.description: Name of the DSGC / group or external laboratory generating the data
items.schema:name: Center_name
items.schema:description: Name of the DSGC / group or external laboratory generating the data

items.title: Principal_investigator
items.description: Independent grant holder(s) and/or lead researcher(s) of the project
items.schema:name: Principal_investigator
items.schema:description: Independent grant holder(s) and/or lead researcher(s) of the project

items.title: Dataset_author_affiliation
items.description: Affiliation of the dataset authors; will be associated with a dataset citation record
items.schema:name: Dataset_author_affiliation
items.schema:description: Affiliation of the dataset authors; will be associated with a dataset citation record

items.title: Funding
items.description: Link to grant number used to generate dataset
items.schema:name: Funding
items.schema:description: Link to grant number used to generate dataset

Assay_name.title: Assay_name
Assay_name.description: Assay used to generate the dataset
Assay_name.schema:name: Assay_name
Assay_name.schema:description: Assay used to generate the dataset

items.title: Area_of_study
items.description: Broad category of the type of assay
items.schema:name: Area_of_study
items.schema:description: Broad category of the type of assay

Assay_description.title: Assay_description
Assay_description.description: Textual description of the assay's features, results, and content
Assay_description.schema:name: Assay_description
Assay_description.schema:description: Textual description of the assay's features, results, and content

Assay_protocol.title: Assay_protocol
Assay_protocol.description: Text or link to assay experimental protocol
Assay_protocol.schema:name: Assay_protocol
Assay_protocol.schema:description: Text or link to assay experimental protocol

Assay_metadata_file.title: Assay_metadata_file
Assay_metadata_file.description: Text or link to assay experimental metadata - reagent concentrations, densities, dosing times, etc.
Assay_metadata_file.schema:name: Assay_metadata_file
Assay_metadata_file.schema:description: Text or link to assay experimental metadata - reagent concentrations, densities, dosing times, etc.

Processing_pipeline.title: Processing_pipeline
Processing_pipeline.description: Text or link to where the processing pipeline is described
Processing_pipeline.schema:name: Processing_pipeline
Processing_pipeline.schema:description: Text or link to where the processing pipeline is described

Data_format_description_location.title: Data_format_description_location
Data_format_description_location.description: Text or link describing the data formatting - basic mapping information, data type, etc.
Data_format_description_location.schema:name: Data_format_description_location
Data_format_description_location.schema:description: Text or link describing the data formatting - basic mapping information, data type, etc.

Dataset_description.title: Dataset_description
Dataset_description.description: Brief text description of what the assay examined including assay type, key reagents, and results
Dataset_description.schema:name: Dataset_description
Dataset_description.schema:description: Brief text description of what the assay examined including assay type, key reagents, and results

Dataset_release_date.title: Dataset_release_date
Dataset_release_date.description: Date the dataset became publicly available
Dataset_release_date.schema:name: Dataset_release_date
Dataset_release_date.schema:description: Date the dataset became publicly available

items.title: Dataset_authors
items.description: People responsible for conception and execution of dataset protocols, data processing and analysis
items.schema:name: Dataset_authors
items.schema:description: People responsible for conception and execution of dataset protocols, data processing and analysis

items.title: Related_publications
items.description: PMIDs of any publications associated with this dataset
items.schema:name: Related_publications
items.schema:description: PMIDs of any publications associated with this dataset

Citation.title: Citation
Citation.description: Brief description describing how to cite use of this dataset (PMID, webside repository, etc.)
Citation.schema:name: Citation
Citation.schema:description: Brief description describing how to cite use of this dataset (PMID, webside repository, etc.)

items.title: Dataset_keywords
items.description: Primary keywords associated with this dataset - comma-separated list
items.schema:name: Dataset_keywords
items.schema:description: Primary keywords associated with this dataset - comma-separated list

items.title: Dataset_QC_QA_information
items.description: Text or link to any quality control/assurance analyses performed on the dataset, assay, etc.
items.schema:name: Dataset_QC_QA_information
items.schema:description: Text or link to any quality control/assurance analyses performed on the dataset, assay, etc.

DSGC_website_for_this_dataset.title: DSGC_website_for_this_dataset
DSGC_website_for_this_dataset.description: Link to data generation center's webside for this dataset
DSGC_website_for_this_dataset.schema:name: DSGC_website_for_this_dataset
DSGC_website_for_this_dataset.schema:description: Link to data generation center's webside for this dataset

LINCS_landing_page.title: LINCS_landing_page
LINCS_landing_page.description: LINCS Landing Page corresponds to the dataset group, based on LINCS dataset group ID (LDG-ID)
LINCS_landing_page.schema:name: LINCS_landing_page
LINCS_landing_page.schema:description: LINCS Landing Page corresponds to the dataset group, based on LINCS dataset group ID (LDG-ID)

Project_name.title: Project_name
Project_name.description: Project for which the dataset is generated
Project_name.schema:name: Project_name
Project_name.schema:description: Project for which the dataset is generated

Dataset_Link.title: Dataset_Link
Dataset_Link.description: URL to repository or center site
Dataset_Link.schema:name: Dataset_Link
Dataset_Link.schema:description: URL to repository or center site

Dataset_Group_Name.title: Dataset_Group_Name
Dataset_Group_Name.description: Descriptive, unique dataset/dataset group name; human interpretable prefered
Dataset_Group_Name.schema:name: Dataset_Group_Name
Dataset_Group_Name.schema:description: Descriptive, unique dataset/dataset group name; human interpretable prefered

items.title: Associated_reagent_metadata_categories
items.description: Required LINCS metadata categories for this assay / dataset
items.schema:name: Associated_reagent_metadata_categories
items.schema:description: Required LINCS metadata categories for this assay / dataset

items.title: Associated_metadata_entities
items.description: List of LINCS-registered reagent entities utilized in this dataset, identified by type and ID
items.schema:name: Associated_metadata_entities
items.schema:description: List of LINCS-registered reagent entities utilized in this dataset, identified by type and ID

items.title: Mapping_to_LINCS_metadata_standard_specifications
items.description: List that aligns data properties (columns) to the metadata standards specifications
items.schema:name: Mapping_to_LINCS_metadata_standard_specifications
items.schema:description: List that aligns data properties (columns) to the metadata standards specifications

items.title: Associated_experimental_variables
items.description: Key variables for use in integrative studies - treatment timepoints, concentrations, etc.
items.schema:name: Associated_experimental_variables
items.schema:description: Key variables for use in integrative studies - treatment timepoints, concentrations, etc.

items.title: Mapping_to_experimental_metadata_fields
items.description: Field mapping information for experimental metadata given to LINCS standard names
items.schema:name: Mapping_to_experimental_metadata_fields
items.schema:description: Field mapping information for experimental metadata given to LINCS standard names

items.title: Dataset_status
items.description: Describes if the data is a new release, addition or update to the previous release, or revision
items.schema:name: Dataset_status
items.schema:description: Describes if the data is a new release, addition or update to the previous release, or revision

items.title: Dataset_file_format
items.description: Format of the published dataset - tsv, csv, xlsx, gctx, etc.
items.schema:name: Dataset_file_format
items.schema:description: Format of the published dataset - tsv, csv, xlsx, gctx, etc.

items.title: Endpoint
items.description: Reported result type, e.g. z-score, fold change, percent
items.schema:name: Endpoint
items.schema:description: Reported result type, e.g. z-score, fold change, percent

Data_file_description.title: Data_file_description
Data_file_description.description: List that provide a description of all columns in the data files
Data_file_description.schema:name: Data_file_description
Data_file_description.schema:description: List that provide a description of all columns in the data files

items.title: Signature_category
items.description: Category of perturbation response measured by the assay
items.schema:name: Signature_category
items.schema:description: Category of perturbation response measured by the assay

schema:name: Dataset
